ygData.subject: Re: Bardic PvP and AE and groups
ygData.msgSnippet: ... duh, man am i stupid sometimes. Thanks for the tip, now i can test out all kinds of theories :) Gendal Concorden, was 46, now 47 lvl bard of Tunare thanks
ygData.messageBody:
>> I cant get this song to do squat. On mobs it will pulse with the animation
>> that looks like selo's accelerando on us, and this will irritate the
>> creature causing them to attack me but thats all i can tell. I tried
>> dualing a friend and it wouldnt even pulse on them, though it was
>> irritating the snakes and bats around me. For that matter, i couldnt even
>> get the dissonance to hurt them. Bellows hurt them, and i could wack all
>> day on them with my weapons, but no aoe song hit them. Didnt try fear now
>> that i think of it... this happened before todays patch but after the last
>> patch. Anybody know what was going on here? I am going to try this again
>> today after this patch and see what happens...
>
>You were grouped. :) Our AE songs (thank goodness!) don't affect our party
>members. Good thing - if they did, I'd be pretty much out of a job. A great
>annoyance though is that AE songs do hurt party members pets, making it
>very tricky to group with them. Wouldn't it make sense that if our buff songs
>don't help pets, our damage songs wouldn't hurt them? :( Ah well...
>
>Lohengrin Windstrider
> -bard of Rallos Zek
>

duh, man am i stupid sometimes. Thanks for the tip, now i can test out all
kinds of theories :)

Gendal Concorden, was 46, now 47 lvl bard of Tunare thanks to the fear plane
Yes, yes you do indeed die hard there.
